CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(AccountRef__r.Regio_Infra__c,"Zuid"),"Regio Zuid", IF(INCLUDES(AccountRef__r.Regio_Infra__c,"Zuid West"),"Regio Zuid West", IF(INCLUDES(AccountRef__r.Regio_Infra__c,"Noord West"),"Regio Noord West", IF(INCLUDES(AccountRef__r.Regio_Infra__c,"Midden Oost"),"Regio Midden Oost", "--"))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Neem de Regio Infra over van de account
CustomField.label: Regio Infra
